question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. apple sign
B. fire hydrant
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The fire hydrant is on the sidewalk in the foreground, while the apple sign is on a building in the background, making their relative depth very obvious from the image.
